feature: Add Torrents via Magnet Links and Torrent Files
workflow_rationale: This is a new user-facing feature that requires UI components (modal), API functions, and integration with existing data flow. It follows the feature workflow: API -> UI -> Integration.

phases.name: API Functions
phases.description: Add API functions to interact with qBittorrent for adding torrents and fetching categories

subtasks.implementation_notes: GET /api/v2/torrents/categories - returns { category_name: { name, savePath } }. Follow existing getMaindata pattern.
subtasks.notes: Added getCategories API function with Category and CategoriesResponse types. Build verification passes.

subtasks.implementation_notes: POST /api/v2/torrents/add with URLSearchParams containing: urls, savepath (optional), category (optional), paused (optional). Follow pauseTorrent pattern.
subtasks.notes: Added addTorrentMagnet API function to src/lib/api.ts. Function uses POST /api/v2/torrents/add endpoint with URLSearchParams for form data. Supports optional savepath, category, and paused parameters. Follows existing API patterns with getApiBaseUrl helper and credentials: 'include'. Project builds successfully with Vite.

subtasks.implementation_notes: POST /api/v2/torrents/add with FormData (multipart) containing: torrents (File), savepath (optional), category (optional), paused (optional). Use FormData instead of URLSearchParams for file upload.
subtasks.notes: Added addTorrentFile API function that uses FormData for multipart/form-data file upload. Follows existing pattern with options for savepath, category, and paused state.

phases.name: Translations
phases.description: Add i18n translations for the add torrent UI in both English and Traditional Chinese

subtasks.description: Add English translations for add torrent modal
subtasks.implementation_notes: Add under 'addTorrent' namespace: title, magnetLink, torrentFile, savePath, category, startPaused, add, selectFile, invalidMagnet, addSuccess, addError, etc.
subtasks.notes: Added English translations for add torrent modal including: title, description, tab labels (magnetLink, file), input labels and placeholders, savePath, category selector, startPaused toggle, add button states, and error messages.

subtasks.description: Add Traditional Chinese translations for add torrent modal
subtasks.implementation_notes: Same keys as en.json, with Traditional Chinese translations.

phases.name: Add Torrent Modal Component
phases.description: Create the add torrent modal dialog component with magnet link and file upload tabs

subtasks.description: Create AddTorrentModal component with form structure
subtasks.implementation_notes: Create modal with: 1) Tabs for Magnet Link vs File Upload, 2) Magnet link textarea input, 3) File input for .torrent files, 4) Optional save path input, 5) Category dropdown (fetch from API), 6) Start paused checkbox, 7) Add button. Use existing Dialog components. Use useMutation for add operations. Use useQuery for categories. Invalidate maindata on success.

phases.name: UI Integration
phases.description: Add the Add Torrent button to sidebar and wire up the modal in the main page

subtasks.implementation_notes: Add a prominent 'Add Torrent' button at the top of the sidebar (above status filters). Use Plus icon from lucide-react. Add onAddTorrent callback prop. Style similar to existing buttons but more prominent (maybe primary color).

subtasks.description: Wire up AddTorrentModal in index route
subtasks.implementation_notes: 1) Import AddTorrentModal, 2) Add isAddTorrentModalOpen state, 3) Pass onAddTorrent callback to Sidebar, 4) Render AddTorrentModal with open/onClose props.

phases.name: End-to-End Verification
phases.description: Verify the complete add torrent flow works end-to-end

subtasks.description: Manual verification of add torrent flow

checks: Add Torrent button visible in sidebar
Modal has Magnet Link and File tabs
Can paste magnet link and submit

subtasks.implementation_notes: Test with real qBittorrent instance. Use sample magnet link: magnet:?xt=urn:btih:EXAMPLEHASH. Test both success and error cases.

parallel_groups.reason: No dependencies, different file sets - can run in parallel

acceptance_criteria: Add torrent via magnet link works
Add torrent via file upload works
New torrent appears in list after adding
verification_strategy.reasoning: Medium risk feature with new API interactions and file upload. TypeScript compilation and build verification ensure code integrity. Manual browser testing required for UX validation.

unit_tests.notes: No existing unit tests in project - focus on manual verification
